breedDescription.Chihuahua: A tiny yet confident dog with a big personality.
breedDescription.Pomeranian: A fluffy and energetic companion with a bold spirit.
breedDescription.Dachshund: A long-bodied, brave, and playful little dog.
breedDescription.Yorkshire Terrier: A small but feisty dog known for its silky coat.
breedDescription.Shih Tzu: A friendly, affectionate lap dog with a regal history.
breedDescription.Maltese: A gentle and elegant toy dog with a luxurious coat.
breedDescription.Toy Poodle: An intelligent and energetic small dog with curly fur.
breedDescription.Papillon: A lively and friendly toy breed with butterfly-like ears.
breedDescription.Jack Russell Terrier: An energetic and fearless hunting dog.
breedDescription.Boston Terrier: A compact and intelligent breed with a tuxedo-like coat.
breedDescription.Cocker Spaniel: A friendly, playful, and affectionate companion.
breedDescription.Bulldog: A stocky and affectionate dog with a distinctive face.
breedDescription.Border Collie: A highly intelligent and energetic herding dog.
breedDescription.Australian Shepherd: An agile and smart working dog with a striking coat.
breedDescription.Beagle: A curious and friendly scent hound, great for families.
breedDescription.Basset Hound: A laid-back scent hound with droopy ears and a great nose.
breedDescription.Whippet: A sleek and fast dog, gentle and affectionate at home.
breedDescription.Standard Poodle: An intelligent and elegant breed, great in water.
breedDescription.Staffordshire Bull Terrier: A strong yet loving and people-friendly breed.
breedDescription.Shetland Sheepdog: A smart and agile herding dog with a lush coat.
breedDescription.Labrador Retriever: A friendly, outgoing, and intelligent retriever.
breedDescription.Golden Retriever: A gentle and affectionate breed, eager to please.
breedDescription.German Shepherd: A highly trainable and protective working dog.
breedDescription.Doberman Pinscher: A sleek, loyal, and highly protective breed.
breedDescription.Siberian Husky: A strong and independent sled dog with a thick coat.
breedDescription.Boxer: A muscular and fun-loving breed with boundless energy.
breedDescription.Chesapeake Bay Retriever: A rugged, intelligent retriever with water skills.
breedDescription.Dalmatian: A spotted and active breed known for its history with firefighters.
breedDescription.Belgian Malinois: A highly trainable and energetic working dog.
breedDescription.Akita: A noble and powerful breed with strong loyalty.
breedDescription.Great Dane: A giant yet gentle dog with an affectionate nature.
breedDescription.Mastiff: A massive and protective guardian with a calm demeanor.
breedDescription.Saint Bernard: A gentle giant known for its rescue work in the Alps.
breedDescription.Newfoundland: A large and gentle water rescue dog.
breedDescription.Irish Wolfhound: A tall and noble sighthound bred for hunting.
breedDescription.Leonberger: A giant, friendly breed with a lion-like mane.
breedDescription.Bernese Mountain Dog: A loyal and gentle working dog with striking markings.
breedDescription.Tibetan Mastiff: A powerful and independent guardian breed.
breedDescription.Alaskan Malamute: A strong and resilient sled dog with a thick coat.
breedDescription.Kuvasz: A large and loyal livestock guardian breed.
breedDescription.Sphynx: A hairless cat known for its wrinkled skin and affectionate nature.
breedDescription.Persian: Fluffy and elegant, the Persian cat is calm and enjoys a relaxed lifestyle.
breedDescription.Maine Coon: One of the largest domestic cats, known for its intelligence and friendly personality.
breedDescription.Ragdoll: A docile and affectionate breed that loves to be held and carried around.
breedDescription.Bengal: A wild-looking cat with a leopard-like coat and an energetic personality.
breedDescription.Siamese: Vocal and social, the Siamese cat thrives on attention and interaction.
breedDescription.British Shorthair: A plush, round-faced breed known for its calm and affectionate nature.
breedDescription.Scottish Fold: Recognizable by its folded ears, this cat has a sweet and loving temperament.
breedDescription.Russian Blue: A sleek, silver-blue cat with a reserved yet loving personality.
breedDescription.American Shorthair: A classic breed known for its robust health and easygoing nature.
breedDescription.Abyssinian: An athletic and playful cat with a love for climbing and exploring.
breedDescription.Burmese: A social and affectionate cat that thrives on human companionship.
breedDescription.Norwegian Forest Cat: A strong and fluffy cat that enjoys outdoor adventures.
breedDescription.Turkish Angora: Elegant and graceful, this cat is known for its silky coat and playful personality.
breedDescription.Manx: A tailless cat with a playful and intelligent disposition.
breedDescription.Singapura: One of the smallest cat breeds, known for its lively and affectionate nature.
breedDescription.Ocicat: A spotted domestic cat with an exotic look and playful demeanor.
breedDescription.Savannah: A hybrid cat with wild ancestry, known for its tall, sleek body and energetic nature.
breedDescription.Chartreux: A quiet and affectionate cat with a plush blue-gray coat.
breedDescription.Korat: A rare breed from Thailand with a striking silver-blue coat and big green eyes.

error.approve: Something went wrong on approving reservation!
error.reject: Something went wrong on rejecting reservation!

Reject.subtitle: Napišite razlog odbijanja, kako bi korisnik znao šta nije u redu.

Confirmation.title: Potvrda
Confirmation.subtitlePaymentAccount: Unesite i potvrdite broj tekućeg računa
Confirmation.banExplanation: Unesite broj tekućeg računa kako bi korisnik mogao da Vam uplati traženi iznos.

paymentDescription.Credit Card: Platite kreditnom karticom na licu mesta.
paymentDescription.Account Payment: Uplatite novac na račun, koji će biti poslat od strane vlasnika objekta.

breedDescription.Chihuahua: Sićušan, ali samouveren pas sa velikom ličnošću.
breedDescription.Pomeranian: Pahuljasti i energični pratilac sa hrabrim duhom.
breedDescription.Dachshund: Pas dugog tela, hrabar i razigran.
breedDescription.Yorkshire Terrier: Mali, ali borben pas poznat po svilenkastom krznu.
breedDescription.Shih Tzu: Prijateljski, privržen pas za krilo sa kraljevskom istorijom.
breedDescription.Maltese: Nežan i elegantan patuljasti pas sa luksuznim krznom.
breedDescription.Toy Poodle: Inteligentan i energičan mali pas sa kovrdžavim krznom.
breedDescription.Papillon: Živahan i prijateljski pas patuljaste rase sa ušima poput leptira.
breedDescription.Boston Terrier: Kompaktna i inteligentna rasa sa kaputom nalik smokingu.
breedDescription.Bulldog: Zdepast i privržen pas sa prepoznatljivim licem.
breedDescription.Border Collie: Izuzetno inteligentan i energičan ovčarski pas.
breedDescription.Australian Shepherd: Okretan i pametan radni pas sa upadljivim krznom.
breedDescription.Beagle: Radoznao i prijateljski gonič, odličan za porodice.
breedDescription.Basset Hound: Opušteni gonič sa spuštenim ušima i odličnim njuhom.
breedDescription.Whippet: Vitak i brz pas, nežan i privržen kod kuće.
breedDescription.Standard Poodle: Inteligentna i elegantna rasa, odlična u vodi.
breedDescription.Staffordshire Bull Terrier: Snažan, ali ljubazan i prijateljski nastrojen pas.
breedDescription.Shetland Sheepdog: Pametan i okretan ovčarski pas sa bujnim krznom.
breedDescription.Pit Bull: Snažan i lojalan pas sa hrabrim srcem.
breedDescription.Golden Retriever: Nežna i privržena rasa, željna da ugodi.
breedDescription.German Shepherd: Vrlo dresiran i zaštitnički nastrojen radni pas.
breedDescription.Doberman Pinscher: Vitak, odan i veoma zaštitnički pas.
breedDescription.Siberian Husky: Snažan i nezavisan vučni pas sa gustim krznom.
breedDescription.Boxer: Mišićava i razigrana rasa sa neiscrpnom energijom.
breedDescription.Chesapeake Bay Retriever: Izdržljiv, inteligentan retriver sa talentom za vodu.
breedDescription.Dalmatian: Šarena i aktivna rasa poznata po istoriji sa vatrogascima.
breedDescription.Belgian Malinois: Vrlo dresiran i energičan radni pas.
breedDescription.Akita: Plemenita i moćna rasa sa snažnom odanošću.
breedDescription.Great Dane: Ogroman, ali nežan pas sa privrženom prirodom.
breedDescription.Mastiff: Masivan i zaštitnički pas sa mirnim temperamentom.
breedDescription.Saint Bernard: Nežni džin poznat po spasilačkom radu u Alpima.
breedDescription.Newfoundland: Veliki i nežan pas za spasavanje u vodi.
breedDescription.Irish Wolfhound: Visok i plemenit hrt uzgajan za lov.
breedDescription.Leonberger: Džinovska, prijateljska rasa sa grivom nalik lavu.
breedDescription.Bernese Mountain Dog: Odan i nežan radni pas sa upečatljivim oznakama.
breedDescription.Alaskan Malamute: Snažan i izdržljiv vučni pas sa gustim krznom.
breedDescription.Kuvasz: Veliki i odani pas čuvar stada.
breedDescription.Sphynx: Mačka bez dlake poznata po naboranoj koži i privrženoj prirodi.
breedDescription.Persian: Pahuljasta i elegantna, persijska mačka je mirna i voli opušten način života.
breedDescription.Maine Coon: Jedna od najvećih domaćih mačaka, poznata po inteligenciji i prijateljskoj prirodi.
breedDescription.Ragdoll: Krotka i privržena rasa koja voli da se nosi i mazi.
breedDescription.Bengal: Mačka divljeg izgleda sa leopardastim krznom i energičnom ličnošću.
breedDescription.Siamese: Glasna i društvena, sijamska mačka uživa u pažnji i interakciji.
breedDescription.British Shorthair: Plišasta mačka okruglog lica poznata po smirenoj i privrženoj prirodi.
breedDescription.Scottish Fold: Prepoznatljiva po savijenim ušima, ova mačka ima nežan i ljubazan temperament.
breedDescription.Russian Blue: Vitka, srebrno-plava mačka sa rezervisanom, ali privrženom ličnošću.
breedDescription.American Shorthair: Klasična rasa poznata po dobrom zdravlju i opuštenoj prirodi.
breedDescription.Abyssinian: Atletska i razigrana mačka koja voli da se penje i istražuje.
breedDescription.Burmese: Društvena i privržena mačka koja uživa u ljudskom društvu.
breedDescription.Norwegian Forest Cat: Snažna i pahuljasta mačka koja uživa u avanturama na otvorenom.
breedDescription.Turkish Angora: Elegantna i graciozna, poznata po svilenkastom krznu i razigranoj prirodi.
breedDescription.Manx: Mačka bez repa sa razigranom i inteligentnom naravi.
breedDescription.Singapura: Jedna od najmanjih rasa mačaka, poznata po živahnoj i privrženoj prirodi.
breedDescription.Ocicat: Šarena domaća mačka sa egzotičnim izgledom i razigranim ponašanjem.
breedDescription.Savannah: Hibridna mačka sa divljim precima, poznata po visokom, vitkom telu i energičnoj prirodi.
breedDescription.Chartreux: Tiha i privržena mačka sa plišanim plavo-sivim krznom.
breedDescription.Korat: Retka rasa iz Tajlanda sa upečatljivim srebrno-plavim krznom i velikim zelenim očima.
